subdomain.error_mustHaveAccount: ‚ùå You must have a Kythia account to claim a subdomain. Use `/start` to create one.
subdomain.error_proOrVoterRequired:
‚ùå This feature is only available for **Premium Users** or **Active Voters**.

Vote on Top.gg to get access for 12 hours!
subdomain.error_maxReached: ‚ùå You have reached the maximum limit of **{max}** subdomains.
subdomain.error_invalidName: ‚ùå Invalid subdomain name. It must be 3-32 characters long and can only contain lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens (-).
subdomain.error_forbidden: ‚ùå The name **{name}** is reserved and cannot be claimed.
subdomain.error_taken: ‚ùå Sorry, the subdomain **{name}** is already taken.
subdomain.error_technical: ‚ùå A technical error occurred while claiming your subdomain. Please try again later.
subdomain.success_desc:
‚úÖ Congratulations! You have successfully claimed **{subdomain}.{domain}**.

*You now have {used}/{max} subdomains.*

set.error_need_account: ‚ùå You must have a Kythia account (`/eco account create`) to manage DNS.
set.error_need_premium_or_vote: ‚ùå This feature is only available for **Premium Users** or **Active Voters**.
set.error_subdomain_not_found: ‚ùå You do not own the subdomain `{subdomain}`.
set.error_fail_desc:
Failed to update the record. Cloudflare returned:
`{error}`

delete.error_notPremium: ‚ùå This feature is only available for **Premium Users** or **Active Voters**.
delete.error_noRecords: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You do not have any DNS records to delete.
delete.error_notFound: ‚ùå The selected DNS record was not found in our database. It might have already been deleted.
delete.error_notOwner: ‚ùå You are not the owner of this DNS record.
delete.error_failedDesc: Failed to delete the record from Cloudflare. Error: `{error}`
delete.success_desc:
The following DNS record has been deleted:

`{type}` `{name}` `->` `{value}`
delete.orphaned_desc: This record was orphaned (only existed in the local database) and has now been cleaned up.

list.not_allowed: ‚ùå This feature is only available for **Premium Users** or **Active Voters**.
list.not_found: ‚ùå You do not own a subdomain named `{subdomain}`.
list.title: DNS Records for `{fqdn}`
list.no_record: ‚ÑπÔ∏è You have no DNS records set for this subdomain. Use `/pro dns set` to add one.
list.has_record: Displaying **{count}** DNS record(s) for this subdomain.

help.title: ## DNS Record Type Reference
help.description:
Here are the supported DNS record types, required fields, and examples.

Use `/pro dns set` to create or update records.

types.name: A (IP Address Record)
types.desc: Maps a domain/subdomain to an IPv4 address.

types.name: CNAME (Canonical Name Record)
types.desc: Aliases a domain/subdomain to another hostname (can only be used for subdomains).

types.name: TXT (Text Record)
types.desc: Stores arbitrary text, commonly used for domain verification (Google, SPF, etc).

types.name: MX (Mail Exchange Record)
types.desc: Specifies mail servers responsible for receiving email.
types.priority: Number indicating priority (lower is preferred; default: 10)
